facet_1.name: Twin Terror
facet_1.effects: Reduces the total attack damage reduction. This ability component levels up with Macropyre. -10%/15%/20%/25% Total Attack Damage Reduction

facet_2.name: Ice Breaker
facet_2.effects: The Ice Path now automatically detonates once it expires, dealing additional damage and applies another stun on all affected enemy units. Increases path duration. +2/1.5/1/0.5s Path Duration. Grants the Destroy Ice Path sub-ability.

effects: Emits two ice walls along the edges of Macropyre that slow any enemy units trying to cross them
Removes the shared cooldown and fixed downtime restriction with Liquid Frost
Removes the shared cooldown and fixed downtime restriction with Liquid Fire

level_25: +2.5% Liquid Fire / Liquid Frost Max Health as Damage
level_15: +50 Liquid Fire Attack Speed Slow / +10 Liquid Frost Proc Damage

abilities.name: Double Trouble
abilities.description: Jakiro's attack launches two projectiles at the target, but deals less damage. The Ice Head always attacks first.
abilities.details: The Fire Head applies an instant attack after the Ice Head's attack at a fixed interval. This attack ignores the melee heroes' damage block innate ability.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Jakiro's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. It may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: The twin head dragon is considered a ground unit, despite its hero model showing otherwise.

ability_1.name: Dual Breath
ability_1.details: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro.
ability_1.description: The ice head applies an attack speed slow and a movement speed slow to affected enemy units. The fire head applies damage over time to affected enemy units.
interaction_notes: Dual Breath has targeting functionalities for both unit and point targeting
Can affect enemy units at max 1025-distance away

ability_2.name: Ice Path
ability_2.details: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemy units that touch it.
ability_2.description: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.

facet_effects.ice_breaker: Path Duration: 5, Detonate Damage: 50/100/150/200, Detonate Stun Duration: 0.5

interaction_notes: All ability effects are applied immediately within the area-of-effect after the effect delay
Can only affect the same enemy units once per cast

ability_3.name: Liquid Fire
ability_3.details: Burns affected enemy units with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attack speed within the radius.
ability_3.description: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.

facet_effects.twin_terror: +50 Liquid Fire Attack Speed Slow, +2.5% Max Health as Damage per Second

interaction_notes: Liquid Fire is an active attack modifier
Has different cast range when casting manually vs autocast

ability_4.name: Liquid Frost
ability_4.details: Frosts the affected enemy unit with ice added to his attack while slowing their movement speed within the radius. Damage instances sourced from Jakiro procs additional damage on the affected unit.
ability_4.description: The right maw of Jakiro opens, punishing all with bitter frost.

facet_effects.twin_terror: +10 Liquid Frost Proc Damage, +2.5% Max Health as Damage per Second

interaction_notes: Liquid Frost is an active attack modifier
Procs on all damage instances sourced to Jakiro

ability_5.name: Macropyre
ability_5.details: Exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
ability_5.description: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
interaction_notes: Creates 6 negative auras cells immediately within the area-of-effect
Scepter upgrade creates two ice walls along the edges
Deals pure damage with Aghanim's Scepter

changes: Rescaled Liquid Frost proc damage from 12/18/24/30 to 8/16/24/32
Reduced Macropyre damage linger duration from 2 to 1
Aghanim's Scepter upgrade: No longer increases Macropyre path width by 70
Increased Dual Breath mana cost from 125/140/155/170 to 135/150/165/180
Reduced Ice Path Ice Breaker detonate damage from 75/125/175/225 to 50/100/150/200
Ice Path: Increased cooldown from 18/15/12/9 to 20/17/14/11
Reduced Ice Breaker path duration bonus from 3/2.5/2/1.5 to 2/1.5/1/0.5
Talents: LVL 15 -1.5s Ice Path cooldown â†’ +60 Ice Path first damage
